SEARCH
Package Utils.MockObjects

Class MockModel

java.lang.Object
Utils.MockObjects.MockModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class MockModel extends Object implements Serializable, Cloneable
The MockModel class represents a lighter version of the model object for the client use. It implements the Serializable and Cloneable interfaces.
See Also:
